name: Vehicle Beat Zombie
description:
Beat zombies hard at three different unique map,driving three unique vehicles.

Can drive three kind of vehicles.
Truck -- high mobility and agile,hit and run.
Armored Vehicle -- bigger firepower ,deploy auto gun to build defend line.
Tank -- ranged damage ,precision strike.

Multiple upgrade options

Grenade -- classic weapon.
Rocket -- use with skill.
Firegrenade -- something burnt.
Missile -- precision strike.
... and more

Realistic mix arcade style driving experience, quick shoot gameplay , caution , driving safety first.



Need a break ? Unlimit range of landscape give you an oppurtunity to run and take advantage point to fight.

welcome to join QQ group ：308542190 chat
